official_title: A Phase 1b/2a, Open-Label, Multi-Center Study of CyPep-1 in Combination With Pembrolizumab to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of CyPep-1 in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma (HNSCC), Melanoma, or Triple-Negative Breast Cancer (TNBC) (CATALYST)
